basic.Peptide Name: Microcin S (MccS, Gly-rich; natural AMPs; antimicrobial protein; class 2a microcin, bacteriocin, Gram-negative bacteria, prokaryotes)
basic.Source: Escherichia coliG3/10;  human microbiota:gut, symbiont bacteria
basic.Target Organism: Expression of this peptide in a plasma-transformed E. coli inhibited its growth.
